text: Wid iteppen rrba, ur d pnekkaren siwa am ara d kren win issexbibev Cciîan, mi t innul. Ayagi, acku nnan: «ttjara am rrba kan». Öebbi Iêell ttjara, Igdel rrba. Win n tusa lewûaya s$uô Mass is, d$a ixva, ines ayen iâaddan. Lameô is ar Öebbi. Wid iu$alen, widak d at tmes, nitni, degs, ad wekkôen
